How_Calculated: Estimated number of people for whom poverty status is determined; whose annual income falls below 100% of the federal poverty level.

Estimated number of people for whom poverty status is determined; whose annual income falls below 100% of the federal poverty level; divided by the number of people for whom poverty status is determined; expressed as percent.

IndicatorName: Children under 5 years old in Poverty
How_Calculated: Estimated number of children who live in a household for whom poverty status is determined; whose annual income falls below twice the federal poverty.

IndicatorName: Children under 5 years old in Poverty
How_Calculated: Estimated number of children in a household whose annual income falls below twice the federal poverty level; divided by the number of children in households for whom poverty status is determined; expressed as percent.

IndicatorName: Children under 5 years old in Poverty
How_Calculated: Neighborhoods are ranked citywide in 3 groups (tertiles); so that neighborhoods can be grouped and compared.

indicator_id: NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene
